comments.comment: Haraam. Halaal. Sambandawa  katha. Karala. Thibenawa.... Haraam  kiyanne  thanam  kiyanekai. Arthaya  wenne...halaal. Kiyanne. Anumathiyai. Kiyannekai  arthaya. Wenne....halaal  kiyana. Wachanaya  mas   maalu. Weni  deyata. Vitharak. Neme   nikamata. Kiyamu  obala   therum   karaganna .....oya  kaden   mudalata  wathura  bothalayak  aragannawa .....eka. Oyaata  halaal ....mama  oyaage. A. Wathura. Bothalaye  oyaage. Awasaraya  nethuwa  bonawa  beela. Bothalaya. Vitharak  othana. Thiyela. Yanawa .....eka. Mata. Haraam ... Mokada. Oyaa. Wathura. Thibaahen  evith. Wathura. Bonna  bothalaya. Athata   gannakota  oke. Wathura  ne   ethakota  oyaage  hithata. Kochcharak  vedanaawak  ethiwenawada? Anika   harakawa   deviyangen  nama  kiyala  bella  kapala  marala  a  masa   aahaarayata  ganneken  saha   sathawa  hinsaawata  path. comments.comment:
Ane kollo apith kawadakwath katawath kisithek meka adinna meka kanna kiyala bala karannath nehe karalath nehe. 
* Oyata habaya adinna kemathida adapan. Kemathi nedda adinnama epa.
* oyata jangi pitin avidinna onada nettang hiruwen yanna onada oyage kemaththak.
(Mekita kiyanna jangi pitin ho hiruwan yanawanam apitath kiyanna kiyala. apith enawa balanna. Apith asaine kollo)
* anith eka Mekita onathey kanna puluwan. Mekita bath kanna onada? Roti kanna onda? Malu kanna onda? Elu mas kanna onada? Ballu mas kanna onada? Nettang uru mas kanna onada? Kanna kiyapan onadeyak aka avilla a kollange kemaththa.
Api honda deval narala deval gena kiyanwa echcharai aka pilipathina ekath athaharina ekath eyalage kemaththa.
* mekita kata hari puka denna ona wunotha thenna kiyapan, puluwannam apitath denna kiyapan. 
Ekanek werathi keroth kauru wunoth kiyala denawane. aka thamai apith kere.

comments.comment: Obala babbuda yako mona tharam agamika buru iganvimakda mona ballage nama kiyalawath yako thawa ekekuge pana nathi karanta ba bolau obalata oya tharamma harak. Kapuwama vitamin labenawanm deiyange nama hithe thiyagenama kapiyau wal mokada harakta oya okkoma labenne walkalane wal kapaganta amarunam wal kapanta kadu genath thiyan inna manda buddykayanta kiyapiyau kapala genath denta kiyala. Moda novi buddymathwa hithapiyau eka eka mole kuruwal. Vichcha ekek obalawa deiyanwa sihipath karagena kawata pasnayak ne kiuwoth obala kamathida marenta ai obalata poddak buddymathwa hithanta bary agama kiyana namen obalata mona boruwakda ugannanne moka unath thawa ekekuge jivithayak nathi karanta epa. Thadana pidana maranaya. Me hamadekatama bayai neda hama sthekmath ehemamai obalage oya agamika iganvima minissunta galapenne thirisanuntanam galapenawa mokada unta hoda naraka therennane. Ethakota eyala mas kanawa dhekala mama ehuwa oyala mas kanne ne nedha kiyala.. ethakota eyala kiyanawa pissudha nangi ewa nethuwa kanne kohomadha.. api ewa kanawa ewa ekka apita sambolekuth hadha gena thamai kanna aasa kiyala.. mas kadawal bahutharayak muslim ayage kiyala mama piligannawa... 
E wagema mas kadawalwalata ena poalime bahutharayak sinhala aya kiyana eka oya piliganna kemathidha...? Maalu kaarayan bahutharayak ma sinhala aya kiyana eka piliganna kemathidha..??
 Saththu meruwoth kanawa kiyanne minisunwa meruwoth kanawadha bro? Nene. E wage me sathunwath ethakota kannethuwa inna puluwan ne. 
Anika oyala harak marana eka gena witharai katha karanne kukullu, ooro maragena kana eka hondhaidha..? Ethakota un saththu nemeidha? Ekata kawuruth wirudhdha wenne nene. Oyata ne kiyanna puluwandha...? Mama eswaling dhekapu dhewal thamai kiyanne... Api ooru mas kanne ne kiyamuko oyala e sathaawath maragena kanawa...
